note.p: Death: His home, 'Malone', St Mary's Avenue, Northwood, Middlesex (04 May 1936)
Education: Kingswood School, Bath; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1886, Senior Wrangler); ScD (1897); MA (Lond)
Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge; Professor of Mathematics, Queen's College, Galway (1893-1901); Professor of Mathematics, Queen's University, Belfast (1901-1930)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1936-1938 vol 2 pp 165-174, plate, by E T Whittaker
